19001299.<voice 00110_19001299><start_lip_sync n0:
Who is it?
This is auntie Fluka's house.

19001300.<voice 00390_19001300><start_lip_sync n0:
Fifi have you abandoned
your books to practice training again?!

8095.<voice 00580_00008095><start_lip_sync n0:
W-wait just a sec...
By the stars, you're...!

8096.<voice 00720_00008096><start_lip_sync n0:
Pardon me, but yer <pc>,
ain't ya?<yesno><close>

8097.<voice 00806_00008097><start_lip_sync n0:
Heh heh.
No use tryin' ta pull da wool ovah
MY eyes. I see right through ya, dear.

8098.<voice 00836_00008098><start_lip_sync n0:
Oh, glorious day! At long last, da
time's come for da Ship Shapers'
dreams to come true.

8099.<voice 00765_00008099><start_lip_sync n0:
I knew it! At long last, da
time's come for da Ship Shapers'
dreams to come true.

19001302.<voice 00877_19001302><start_lip_sync n0:
The story of Erju again...
Isn't that just a fairy tale?

19001303.<voice 00922_19001303><start_lip_sync n0:
I told it like a fairy tale but it
actually happened. And this is the
person we've been waiting for!

19001306.<voice 01252_19001306><start_lip_sync n0:
She is my aide, Fifi. I'm thinking of
taking her as my apprentice.

19001307.<voice 01282_19001307><start_lip_sync n0:
Her potential as a Ship Shaper is
excellent but, as you may have
noticed...

19001308.<voice 01283_19001308><start_lip_sync n0:
She gives up rather easily and is
difficult to keep motivated.

19001309.<voice 01347_19001309><start_lip_sync n0:
The clan of Ship Shapers has passed down your story through the ages. We have been eagerly
awaiting your arrival in this time.

19001310.<voice 01348_19001310><start_lip_sync n0:
Yes, I have been waiting for
quite some time now...

8103.<voice 01377_00008103><start_lip_sync n0:
When a great darkness is born into da
world, a traveler named <pc> will
appear seekin' da art of da Sacred Ship.

8104.<voice 01417_00008104><start_lip_sync n0:
Until that day comes, we must never
cease ta pass on da sacred art...

8105.<voice 01447_00008105><start_lip_sync n0:
In the 500 years since da days of our
progenitor, Elder Erju, our clan 'as kept
this vow from generation ta generation.

8106.<voice 01502_00008106><start_lip_sync n0:
An' a few months ago, when I
witnessed da birth of Hades' Heart
wit' my own eyes... I was convinced.

8107.<voice 01532_00008107><start_lip_sync n0:
I am to be da Ship Shaper that'll
carry ya to da Netherlord...

8108.<voice 01582_00008108><start_lip_sync n0:
Immediately, I scurried to da summit
of the Landon Mountains where Hades'
Heart is located to await yer arrival.

8110.<voice 02222_00008110><start_lip_sync n0:
Ho ho ho.
Ye've done well, <pc>.

8111.<voice 02252_00008111><start_lip_sync n0:
Thanks to all yer hard work, the art of the Sacred Ship 'as been passed on tae the next generation.
At long last, that lazy old coot can come into 'er own.

19001311.<voice 02472_19001311><start_lip_sync n0:
First we need tae see if ye can get to
Hades' Heart with the Sacred Ship...

8114.<voice 02552_00008114><start_lip_sync n0:
Now go. Fluka awaits ye at the
summit of the Landon Mountains.

8115.<voice 02582_00008115><start_lip_sync n0:
I'm countin' on ye, <pc>!
I know ye 'ave the power ta
strike Nergel down!

19001315.<voice 00003_19001315><start_lip_sync n0:
Long time no see <cs_pchero>!
As I promised so long ago, in return for
your friendship I will lend you my power.

19001316.<voice 00004_19001316><start_lip_sync n0:
This girl is the yin to my yang.
She has talent but lacks a bold spirit.

19001317.<voice 00005_19001317><start_lip_sync n0:
She won't try to move forward for fear
of failure. It's quite frustrating to see.

19001318.<voice 00007_19001318><start_lip_sync n0:
Well, <cs_pchero>, you may
once again use my clans power to
its full extent!

19001320.<voice 00009_19001320><start_lip_sync n0:
The swan is the finest form of Ship
Shaping!

19001322.<voice 00011_19001322><start_lip_sync n0:
Before entering Hades' Heart, may I
have a word with you?

19001323.<voice 00012_19001323><start_lip_sync n0:
It is said that the dark lord Nergel
was born from Reidametes, who you
once faced with my ancestor, Erju.

19001324.<voice 00013_19001324><start_lip_sync n0:
Defeating the dark lord is a quest set forth upon by my clan over 500 years ago. Please help us
complete this task at last.

19001325.<voice 00014_19001325><start_lip_sync n0:
Ok then <pc>...
Say a prayer and then the ship
can depart.

19001326.<voice 00015_19001326><start_lip_sync n0:
Please take care.
And good luck...

28342.<voice 00974_00028342><start_lip_sync n0:
Quite a modern look, isn't it?
Ohohoho...

19001327.<voice 01095_19001327><start_lip_sync n0:
But you'll soon find out that the swan
is the finest form a Ship Shaper
can achieve...

19001330.<voice 02180_19001330><start_lip_sync n0:
I've always been told that it was
futile to fight...

19001331.<voice 02190_19001331><start_lip_sync n0: That this was nothing but a fairy tale.

8128.<voice 00310_00008128><start_lip_sync n0:
In other words, slayin' da Netherlord 'as been da heartfelt wish of the Four Sorcerers fer over 500 years.
Please, see dis through to the end.

8129.<voice 00909_00008129><start_lip_sync n0:
Please be careful.
We wish you da best of luck...

19001334.<voice 00001_19001334><start_lip_sync n0:
It seems the evil power of the dark
lord of Hades' Heart is stronger than
we expected...

19001335.<voice 00002_19001335><start_lip_sync n0:
That ship...
It was my best effort...

19001336.<voice 00003_19001336><start_lip_sync n0:
...I'm sorry but it seems my powers
are not enough to create a ship
which can reach the dark lords lair...

19001337.<voice 00004_19001337><start_lip_sync n0: It's no use... No matter what I do...

19001338.<voice 00005_19001338><start_lip_sync n0:
This sort of thing doesn't happen
in fairy tales... That's what makes
them so wonderful.

19001339.<voice 00006_19001339><start_lip_sync n0: What the hell! You little brat!

19001340.<voice 00007_19001340><start_lip_sync n0:
Oh Hyuza...
What's your favorite story again?

19001341.<voice 00008_19001341><start_lip_sync n0: Isn't it 'The Brave Few of Long Ago'?

19001342.<voice 00009_19001342><start_lip_sync n0: This is not a fairy tale!!

19001343.<voice 00010_19001343><start_lip_sync n0:
Okay... The only way will be to
complete Fifi's training and have her
summon the most bad ass ship ever!

19001344.<voice 00011_19001344><start_lip_sync n0:
As I said, her potential is limitless. She
will be even greater than I after this!

19001345.<voice 00012_19001345><start_lip_sync n0:
But with that attitude it will be difficult
to motivate her. Her effort will truly
be a sight to see...

19001346.<voice 00013_19001346><start_lip_sync n0: It'll be fine, she has a fiery heart.

19001347.<voice 00014_19001347><start_lip_sync n0:
It's not that she doesn't believe in
herself, but she may need a little
extra push to get there.

19001349.<voice 00016_19001349><start_lip_sync n0:
By the way, <cs_pchero>.
You haven't collected all of the
key emblems yet have you?

19001350.<voice 00017_19001350><start_lip_sync n0: Leave Fifi's training up to us...

19001351.<voice 00018_19001351><start_lip_sync n0:
You'd better go and collect the rest
of the emblems and prepare
yourself for the battle to come.

19001353.<voice 00001_19001353><start_lip_sync n0:
...Well it's an easy, quick read for
most, but...

19001354.<voice 00002_19001354><start_lip_sync n0:
It's about how bravery and friendship
can conquer many challenges, right?

19001355.<voice 00003_19001355><start_lip_sync n0: Yeah, it all works out in the end.

19001356.<voice 00004_19001356><start_lip_sync n0: I've always loved it since I was a child.

19001357.<voice 00005_19001357><start_lip_sync n0:
The friendship between Erju and his
friends was so powerful that it performed
miracles. I want to be like that too.

19001358.<voice 00006_19001358><start_lip_sync n0:
But it's just a fairy tale after all.
Things don't work that way in the
real world.

19001359.<voice 00007_19001359><start_lip_sync n0:
In real life you can't win battles with
hopes and wishes. You have to work hard
and trust your abilities in order to succeed.

19001360.<voice 00008_19001360><start_lip_sync n0:
But you can still wish to succeed by
training hard and doing your best...

19001361.<voice 00009_19001361><start_lip_sync n0:
...I think that's what must do.
Try to succeed by hard work.

19001362.<voice 00010_19001362><start_lip_sync n0:
But my doubts will always be there...
'What if I cant do it...'
'What if I don't succeed...'

19001363.<voice 00011_19001363><start_lip_sync n0:
I doubt yourself.
I feel like I can't do it just
because I tried once and failed...

19001365.<voice 00013_19001365><start_lip_sync n0: I think you can do it.

19001366.<voice 00014_19001366><start_lip_sync n0:
Enough nonsense talk.
Fluka says have all the talent.
If anyone can do it, it's me.

19001367.<voice 00015_19001367><start_lip_sync n0:
Well, okay... Give it a try then.
Study hard and give it your all.

19001368.<voice 00016_19001368><start_lip_sync n0:
We need to collect the key
emblems from all of the continents.

19001369.<voice 00017_19001369><start_lip_sync n0:
Aaah... Isn't that pretty tough, even
to get just one of them?

19001370.<voice 00018_19001370><start_lip_sync n0:
Yes, but I believe we can do it.
Just you watch.

19001372.<voice 00020_19001372><start_lip_sync n0:
I know it seems impossible. But if we can
do it then we can go to Hades' Heart.

19001373.<voice 00021_19001373><start_lip_sync n0:
I'll be waiting here and working
hard if you need help.

19001375.<voice 00000_19001375><start_lip_sync n0:
Fifi hardly cleans her own room,
let alone work on her training.

19001376.<voice 00001_19001376><start_lip_sync n0:
She's usually lounging around reading
a book or taking a nap.

19001378.<voice 00001_19001378><start_lip_sync n0: I don't know if I can do it...

19001379.<voice 00002_19001379><start_lip_sync n0:
If you work hard you can achieve
anything.

19001380.<voice 00003_19001380><start_lip_sync n0:
Yes! I am gifted after all.
I'll use my tremendous talent to do it!

19001383.<voice 00001_19001383><start_lip_sync n0: Something has been on my mind lately...

19001386.<voice 00002_19001386><start_lip_sync n0:
You just keep getting better and
better, Fifi!

19001387.<voice 00003_19001387><start_lip_sync n0:
As long as Fifi is all talent and no
effort. It'll never work like that.

19001390.<voice 00000_19001390><start_lip_sync n0:
Fifi and I have begun our training
again!

19001391.<voice 00001_19001391><start_lip_sync n0:
With talent like that, her
progress has been amazing!

19001392.<voice 00000_19001392><start_lip_sync n0: Fifi! Look, we have all the key emblems!

19001394.<voice 00002_19001394><start_lip_sync n0:
We made it! With hope and
determination on our side we
collected all of the key emblems!

19001395.<voice 00003_19001395><start_lip_sync n0:
Took you long enough... I guess I
shouldn't expect everyone to be
as talented as I am.

19001397.<voice 00005_19001397><start_lip_sync n0:
I'm brilliant!
The greatest of my time!
Hehehehehe!

19001398.<voice 00006_19001398><start_lip_sync n0:
I can do it! I can do it!
A ship that will fly to Hades' Heart!
I can do it!!

19001399.<voice 00007_19001399><start_lip_sync n0:
I did it! I'm amazing! Hahaha!!
I did it, I did it, I did it!!!

19001401.<voice 00009_19001401><start_lip_sync n0:
That's amazing! You did it!
Brilliant!!

19001402.<voice 00010_19001402><start_lip_sync n0:
Yes, of course I'm amazing. Don't
underestimate the greatest of all time!

19001403.<voice 00011_19001403><start_lip_sync n0:
With this, you're free to go beat on

19001404.<voice 00012_19001404><start_lip_sync n0:

19001405.<voice 00001_19001405><start_lip_sync n0:

8132.<voice 00002_00008132><start_lip_sync n0:

19001406.<voice 00003_19001406><start_lip_sync n0:

8131.<voice 00100_00008131><start_lip_sync n0:
Thanks to all yer hard work, the art of the Sacred Ship 'as been passed on tae the next generation.

Now go. Fluka awaits ye at the

8135.<voice 00260_00008135><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 00260_00008135><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>You've arrived at last.

8136.<voice 00325_00008136><start_lip_sync m5:
<center>As anticipated, you Ethenians were
a dangerous seed that contaminated
my plans...

8137.<voice 00385_00008137><start_lip_sync m5:
<center>But to throw yourself at the
threshold of Hades' Heart, my own
castle, is foolish even for you.

8138.<voice 00425_00008138><start_lip_sync m5:
<center>No matter what strength you may
possess, I am invincible in this
world where death reigns supreme.

8139.<voice 00465_00008139><start_lip_sync m5:
<center>Now, make haste to my throne.
I welcome your visit with gladness.

8149.<voice 00560_00008149><start_lip_sync al:
It is good to see you, <pc>
of Ethene Village. I'm proud of
you for making it this far.

8150.<voice 01185_00008150><start_lip_sync al:

Heart; a prison of souls fashioned by
the Netherlord's hand.

8151.<voice 01840_00008151><start_lip_sync al:

8152.<voice 01870_00008152><start_lip_sync al:

8153.<voice 02361_00008153><start_lip_sync al:

powerful than when he sealed Lendersia.

8154.<voice 02391_00008154><start_lip_sync al:

8155.<voice 02963_00008155><start_lip_sync al:
of Ethene Village. I believe that you have the power to strike down any opponent, no

8157.<voice 04106_00008157><start_lip_sync al:

of Ethene Village. I believe that you have the power to strike down any opponent, no

8203.<voice 00660_00008203><start_lip_sync al:
Heeey! Good to see ya again,
<pc> of Ethene.
I was hoping you'd turn up.

8204.<voice 01345_00008204><start_lip_sync al:
Hey, have you heard? This is Hades'
Heart, made by Netherlord Nergel
to trap the souls of the dead.

8205.<voice 01930_00008205><start_lip_sync al:
Nergel captures 'em and turns 'em
into dark magic, then absorbs 'em so
he can recharge.

8206.<voice 01960_00008206><start_lip_sync al:
He's been cooped up in here since he
sealed Lendersia. Apparently his
magic's gotten crazy powerful lately.

8207.<voice 02506_00008207><start_lip_sync al:
And if he makes his move, it won't
just be Lendersia, y'know?
The whole world'll get sealed away!

8208.<voice 02536_00008208><start_lip_sync al:
...That's what they say, anyway.
But it's your mission to stop 'im, right?
That's why you've come so far.

8209.<voice 03108_00008209><start_lip_sync al:
...Yeah. I know you can do it.
You're the one I trusted with my
image, after all!

8210.<voice 03198_00008210><start_lip_sync al:
...Huh? Guess I can't stay like this
much longer. If I push myself any
more, I'm gonna disappear.

8211.<voice 04256_00008211><start_lip_sync al:
Anyway, I've got your back, so make
sure you kick Nergel's gloomy ass
for me, okay?!

8194.<voice 00660_00008194><start_lip_sync al:
Good to see ya again,
<pc> of Ethene.
Been waitin' for ya.

8195.<voice 01345_00008195><start_lip_sync al:
This's the inside of Hades' Heart. It's an alternate dimension created by Netherlord Nergel to hold the
souls of the dead.

8196.<voice 01930_00008196><start_lip_sync al:
Nergel captures 'em and turns 'em
into dark magic, then absorbs 'em
so he can recharge.

8197.<voice 01960_00008197><start_lip_sync al:
He's been holed up in here since
Lendersia was sealed away, and now
his magic power's through the roof.

8198.<voice 02506_00008198><start_lip_sync al:
If nothing's done, every continent
on the planet could get trapped
under his dark seal.

8199.<voice 02536_00008199><start_lip_sync al:
But...I'm sure you'll be able
to work something out.

8200.<voice 03108_00008200><start_lip_sync al:
I mean, that's why you're here. It's why you got revived, honed your skills, collected the Key Emblems,
and came all this way.

8201.<voice 03198_00008201><start_lip_sync al:
...Rats, looks like this form's got
a time limit.

8202.<voice 04256_00008202><start_lip_sync al:
I'm a ghost, so I can't really do much, but I'll always support you... I'm sure you'll beat Nergel and
bring peace to the world...

8185.<voice 00760_00008185><start_lip_sync al:
We meet again, <pc> of Ethene.
I've been waiting for you to get here.

8186.<voice 01505_00008186><start_lip_sync al:
Hades' Heart is a place Netherlord
Nergel made where the souls of the
dead get locked away.

8187.<voice 02020_00008187><start_lip_sync al:
I've heard Nergel has grown even more powerful than before by feeding on the souls he collects here to
restore his magic.

8188.<voice 02050_00008188><start_lip_sync al:
It's an evil way of gaining power by
stealing it from others rather than
honing one's own body.

8189.<voice 02651_00008189><start_lip_sync al:
Now I hear that he's become even
stronger than when he sealed Lendersia.

8190.<voice 02681_00008190><start_lip_sync al:
Maybe he's become so powerful that he's already capable of ensnaring the whole world with his dark seal.
How's that make you feel? Are you scared?

8191.<voice 03253_00008191><start_lip_sync al:
...Heh. What's with that dumb expression? So this is the person I gave my physical form to, huh?
It's actually kind of reassuring.

8192.<voice 03343_00008192><start_lip_sync al:
...Hmm? Guess I can't keep this
form for too long, huh?

8193.<voice 04406_00008193><start_lip_sync al:
Well, I've said my piece, so I'll
leave the rest to you now.
Don't let me down, okay?

8176.<voice 00760_00008176><start_lip_sync al:
Hey! We meet again,
<pc> of Ethene.
Good on you for making it this far!

8177.<voice 01505_00008177><start_lip_sync al:
Hades' Heart is a place Netherlord
Nergel made where the souls of the
dead get locked away.

8178.<voice 02020_00008178><start_lip_sync al:
I've heard that bastard feeds on the
souls he collects to restore his own
magic and increase his power even further.

8179.<voice 02050_00008179><start_lip_sync al:
It's a rotten way of gaining power by
stealing it from others rather than
honing one's own body.

8180.<voice 02651_00008180><start_lip_sync al:
So now it seems like that jerk's even
stronger than when he sealed Lendersia.

8181.<voice 02681_00008181><start_lip_sync al:
And he won't stop with Lendersia; his plan is to seal off all the continents. He might be getting ready to make
his move.

8182.<voice 03253_00008182><start_lip_sync al:
You showed up right in the nick of time. If Nergel tries anything, then you'll just have to take him out before he
gets the chance.

8183.<voice 03343_00008183><start_lip_sync al:
...Whoops, looks like I don't have
time for small talk, huh?

8184.<voice 04406_00008184><start_lip_sync al:
It's hard for me to maintain this form in a place like this, so I'll have to disappear for a while.
I leave the rest to you!

8224.<voice 00860_00008224><start_lip_sync al:
Yahoo! You're here, of Ethene Village. Weird coincidence bumping into each other in a place
like this, huh?

8225.<voice 00925_00008225><start_lip_sync al:
...C'mon, I'm tryin' to do a bit!
Gimme something to work with here!

8226.<voice 01615_00008226><start_lip_sync al:
This is Netherlord Nergel's lair! It's where he collects the souls of the dead and absorbs 'em to become
part of his magic!

8227.<voice 02103_00008227><start_lip_sync al:
There's no way we'd just 'bump
into each other' in a place like this!

8228.<voice 02153_00008228><start_lip_sync al:
...Aha! Maybe you ignored me
because you wanted me to Sober
Slap you back as part of the routine!

8229.<voice 02733_00008229><start_lip_sync al:
...When did you learn such advanced techniques? You've become quite formidable.
As the one I entrusted my image to, you've done me proud.

8230.<voice 02763_00008230><start_lip_sync al:
Now it doesn't even matter how
much tougher Nergel's gotten.

8231.<voice 03406_00008231><start_lip_sync al:
...Yeah, he's been here in Hades' Heart for a long time now restoring his magic, and it seems he's grown stronger
than ever.

8232.<voice 03436_00008232><start_lip_sync al:
I was scared that if things continue as they are, every continent on Astoltia would be sealed off and the world
would become a dark place without a single laugh to be heard.

8233.<voice 03466_00008233><start_lip_sync al:
But now that you're here, I feel
relieved. So go put your comedic mastery
to use and make Nergel die laughing!

8234.<voice 03551_00008234><start_lip_sync al:
...Whoa mama.
Looks like I can't stay much longer.

8235.<voice 04556_00008235><start_lip_sync al:
I know it's a shock that you won't be able to see my adorable-yet-oh- so-pretty face anymore, but don't
let it get ya down. You've got this!

8212.<voice 00860_00008212><start_lip_sync al:
Heya, <pc> of Ethene!
What a coincidence, bumping into
you in a place like this!

8213.<voice 00925_00008213><start_lip_sync al:
...C'mon, I'm tryin' to do a bit!
Gimme something to work with here.

8214.<voice 01615_00008214><start_lip_sync al:
This is Netherlord Nergel's lair! It's where he collects the souls of the dead and absorbs 'em to become part
of his magic!

8215.<voice 02103_00008215><start_lip_sync al:
There's no way I'd just 'bump into
you' in a place like this!

8216.<voice 02153_00008216><start_lip_sync al:
...Aha! Maybe you ignored me because
you wanted me to Sober Slap you back
as part of the routine?!

8217.<voice 02733_00008217><start_lip_sync al:
You're good!! As the person I entrusted my image to, you've done me proud. You became a master comedian
before I could even blink.

8218.<voice 02763_00008218><start_lip_sync al:
Now it doesn't even matter how
much tougher Nergel's gotten.

8219.<voice 03406_00008219><start_lip_sync al:
...Yeah, he's been here in Hades' Heart for a long time now restoring his magic, and it seems he's grown
stronger than ever.

8220.<voice 03436_00008220><start_lip_sync al:
I was scared that if things continue as they are, every continent on Astoltia would be sealed off and the world
would become a dark place without a single laugh to be heard.

8221.<voice 03466_00008221><start_lip_sync al:
But now that you're here, I feel
relieved. So go put your comedic mastery
to use and make Nergel die laughing!

8222.<voice 03551_00008222><start_lip_sync al:
...Whoops-a-daisy.

8223.<voice 04556_00008223><start_lip_sync al:

down. You've got this!

8167.<voice 01025_00008167><start_lip_sync al:
Oh? Good to see ya again, of Ethene Village. I'm amazed that you've made it
all the way here.

8168.<voice 01780_00008168><start_lip_sync al:
Hades' Heart was created by Nergel
to round up all the souls of the dead.

8169.<voice 02215_00008169><start_lip_sync al:
It's said that he eats the souls he
collects and turns 'em into dark
magic to heal himself.

8170.<voice 02245_00008170><start_lip_sync al:
He used up a lot of magic to seal
Lendersia, so now he's been resting
on his laurels here for a good while.

8171.<voice 02879_00008171><start_lip_sync al:
And now that he's back on his feet,
he's even more vigorous than when
he sealed Lendersia.

8172.<voice 02909_00008172><start_lip_sync al:
I thought that all the continents might
fall under his dark seal if nothing
was done.

8173.<voice 03606_00008173><start_lip_sync al:
But when I saw your face in Ethene
Village, I felt a sense of relief.

8174.<voice 03636_00008174><start_lip_sync al:
Nergel's got a reputation for being
powerful, and treacherous to
boot. But I believe you can beat 'im.

8175.<voice 04706_00008175><start_lip_sync al:
...Huh? Looks like I need to cut
this short like back at the Temple
of Light. Be seeing you! Good luck!

8158.<voice 01025_00008158><start_lip_sync al:
Ayy! We meet again, eh, <pc>
of Ethene? I'm surprised you'd
come all the way out to a place like this.

8159.<voice 01780_00008159><start_lip_sync al:
Hades' Heart was created by Nergel
to round up all the souls of the dead.

8160.<voice 02215_00008160><start_lip_sync al:
It's said he gobbles up the souls
he collects and turns 'em into dark
magic to heal himself.

8161.<voice 02245_00008161><start_lip_sync al:
He used up a lot of magic to seal
Lendersia, so now that bastard's been
resting on his laurels here for a good while.

8162.<voice 02879_00008162><start_lip_sync al:
And now that he's back on his feet,
he's even more pepped up than
when he sealed Lendersia.

8163.<voice 02909_00008163><start_lip_sync al:
I was in a big hurry 'cause I'm thinkin' that all the continents might fall under his dark seal if we don't
do something.

8164.<voice 03606_00008164><start_lip_sync al:
But if you've made it this far,
everything's peachy keen now, right?

8165.<voice 03636_00008165><start_lip_sync al:
Nergel's known for his strength, and
he's a dirty cheater to boot. But I
believe you can beat 'im.

8166.<voice 04706_00008166><start_lip_sync al:
...Oop, looks like I need to cut this short
like back at the Temple of Light.
Be seein' you! Good luck!

19001408.<voice 05100_19001408><start_lip_sync n0:
<pc> I'm glad I was able to
help you and make a difference.

19001409.<voice 05200_19001409><start_lip_sync n0:
Is that <pc>?

brings the world hope.

19001410.<voice 05300_19001410><start_lip_sync n0:
That's our <pc>!

19001411.<voice 05400_19001411><start_lip_sync n0:
Isn't that <pc>?

8286.<voice 00341_00008286><start_lip_sync m5:

I've been waiting for you,
survivors of Ethene Village.

8287.<voice 00522_00008287><start_lip_sync m5:

19001414.<voice 00525_19001414><start_lip_sync n0: I have a bad feeling about this!

8288.<voice 00855_00008288><start_lip_sync m5:
The chains of Hades are woven with
the hatred of the dead. The living
shall never sever them.

8239.<voice 01972_00008239><start_lip_sync al:

8240.<voice 02423_00008240><start_lip_sync al:

8299.<voice 01972_00008299><start_lip_sync al:

8300.<voice 02423_00008300><start_lip_sync al:

8301.<voice 02585_00008301><start_lip_sync al:

my dream for me...

8279.<voice 01972_00008279><start_lip_sync al:

8281.<voice 02585_00008281><start_lip_sync al: Then, go carry on my dream...

8319.<voice 01972_00008319><start_lip_sync al:

8320.<voice 02423_00008320><start_lip_sync al:

8290.<voice 02813_00008290><start_lip_sync al:

8271.<voice 02975_00008271><start_lip_sync al: Then, go carry on my dream...

8292.<voice 03107_00008292><start_lip_sync m5:
...To think that a mere spirit could defy me, and even go so far as to shatter the shackles of Hades.

8293.<voice 03196_00008293><start_lip_sync m5:
Nevertheless, it is still folly to
believe that you could defeat me.

8294.<voice 03282_00008294><start_lip_sync m5:
The Netherlord is he who

8295.<voice 03423_00008295><start_lip_sync m5: And no living thing escapes death!!

8336.<voice 00107_00008336><start_lip_sync m5:
How magnanimous of you to appear
before me yet again to offer up

8337.<voice 00196_00008337><start_lip_sync m5:

8338.<voice 00282_00008338><start_lip_sync m5:
The Netherlord is he who
commands dominion over death.

27329.<voice 00423_00027329><start_lip_sync m5: And no living thing escapes death!!

8339.<voice 00160_00008339><start_lip_sync n0:
Ggghhhkk... U-unthinkable!

8340.<voice 00290_00008340><start_lip_sync n0:
But I cannot fall yet! I have not yet
realized my grand ambition to seal

8341.<voice 00660_00008341><start_lip_sync n0:

Grant me your power!

8343.<voice 02685_00008343><start_lip_sync n0:

THIS IMMENSE MAGICAL POWER!

8344.<voice 02820_00008344><start_lip_sync n0:

BORN OF DEATH TO RETURN
ALL THINGS TO DEATH.

15397.<center>今こそ チカラを貸しましょう！\n私の創りだせし 光輪の上を\n:

8345.<voice 03755_00008345><start_lip_sync n0:
RRRROOOAAAAARRRR!!

8347.<voice 00785_00008347><start_lip_sync m5:

8348.<voice 01005_00008348><start_lip_sync m5:

8349.<voice 01343_00008349><start_lip_sync m5:

8364.<voice 00457_00008364><start_lip_sync al:
At long last, you have slayed
Netherlord Nergel.

8365.<voice 00487_00008365><start_lip_sync al:
On behalf of all living creatures in
this world, I offer you my thanks,
<cs_pchero> of Ethene Village.

8366.<voice 01552_00008366><start_lip_sync al:
Before I died, I had a strange dream.
In it, I received a prophecy.

8367.<voice 01582_00008367><start_lip_sync al:
It was a horrible scene: the lush green
land of the Elves became desolate,
and eventually all was lost.

8368.<voice 02047_00008368><start_lip_sync al:
That prophecy revealed my path to me: to learn the lost spells of the Elves from all over the globe and in doing so
avert the coming crisis.

8369.<voice 02077_00008369><start_lip_sync al:
When I awoke, I realized my
mission, and after much toil, I
finally managed to find one...

8370.<voice 02622_00008370><start_lip_sync al:
But I failed to revive it, and was
killed by the spell's backlash.

8371.<voice 02652_00008371><start_lip_sync al:
Looking back on things now, it
was shortly after that that your soul
took over my body.

8372.<voice 03037_00008372><start_lip_sync al:
My only regret is that I was unable to
fulfill the prophecy from my dream.
That's why I'd like to entrust it to you.

8373.<voice 03067_00008373><start_lip_sync al:
Please, travel to Lendersia and
use my form to acquire the lost spells
and stop our land's destruction.

8374.<voice 03622_00008374><start_lip_sync al:
...I shouldn't be saying this. Forgive me, I didn't mean to be so brazen. But please keep it in
the back of your mind.

8375.<voice 03652_00008375><start_lip_sync al:

all those feelings out. Now I'll be able
to rest in peace.

8376.<voice 04222_00008376><start_lip_sync al:

time, it really is goodbye. Of course, I

8377.<voice 04252_00008377><start_lip_sync al:

of happiness.

8379.<voice 01487_00008379><start_lip_sync al:
On behalf of everyone in the whole
world, lemme offer you my thanks,
<cs_pchero> of Ethene.

8380.<voice 01957_00008380><start_lip_sync al:
Actually, there's a story I've been
meanin' to tell you. I was an orphan
growin' up, an' I had an older brother.

8381.<voice 01987_00008381><start_lip_sync al:
Ever since we were little, we loved diggin' in the ground. We traveled all over, diggin' in one place and
then another.

8382.<voice 02507_00008382><start_lip_sync al:
Bro always said he wanted to dig
up a legendary treasure someday.
I felt the same.

8383.<voice 02537_00008383><start_lip_sync al:

to split up and began training
separately to develop our skills.

8384.<voice 02567_00008384><start_lip_sync al:
My bro went to Lendersia, and I
ended up down in Agrani to help
with the mine.

8385.<voice 02942_00008385><start_lip_sync al:

I was killed by a fallin' rock
and your spirit took over my body.

8386.<voice 02972_00008386><start_lip_sync al:
There's no way I could ever face
my bro without finishin' what we
set out to do.

8387.<voice 03512_00008387><start_lip_sync al:

treasure for me?

8388.<voice 04112_00008388><start_lip_sync al:
...Nah, I shouldn't be doin' none
a that. I'm just guilt tripping you at
this point. Forget I said anything.

8389.<voice 04142_00008389><start_lip_sync al:

8390.<voice 05287_00008390><start_lip_sync al:

8391.<voice 05317_00008391><start_lip_sync al:

8407.<voice 00957_00008407><start_lip_sync al:

8408.<voice 01742_00008408><start_lip_sync al:
...There's something I've really
wanted to tell you.

8409.<voice 01772_00008409><start_lip_sync al:
The truth is, I'm actually from

I came to Langao for a reason.

8410.<voice 02267_00008410><start_lip_sync al:
My family lived peacefully in a village in Lendersia until one day we were attacked by a mysterious group
of people in red cloaks.

8411.<voice 02297_00008411><start_lip_sync al:
Pops was killed by their leader, and
the old lady died from injuries
she received during the escape...

8412.<voice 02327_00008412><start_lip_sync al:

wasn't that good of a fighter.

8413.<voice 02782_00008413><start_lip_sync al:

8414.<voice 02812_00008414><start_lip_sync al:

my body.

8415.<voice 03322_00008415><start_lip_sync al:

avenge them in my place?

8416.<voice 03872_00008416><start_lip_sync al:

just a fading ghost. I'll leave it to
you to decide what you want to do.

8417.<voice 03902_00008417><start_lip_sync al:

me out. Seems I still had a couple
lingering regrets.

8418.<voice 04762_00008418><start_lip_sync al:

8419.<voice 04792_00008419><start_lip_sync al:
